message.content: {"given_definition_quality":85,"better_definition":"to make a phone call","sentence":"他们打电话。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style scene showing two simple cartoon people holding phones to their ears, standing apart in a minimal ruined cityscape, showing cracked roads and faded buildings in pastel colors.
